mapper.select: SELECT sr.role_name roleName, sr.id, ( SELECT count( * ) FROM sys_user_role sur WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId} AND sur.role_id = sr.id ) AS checked FROM sys_role sr WHERE sr.is_delete =0
SELECT sr.id, sr.role_name as roleName, sr.role_code as roleCode FROM sys_user_role sur INNER JOIN sys_role sr ON sur.role_id = sr.id WHERE sur.user_id=#{userId}
